subject: Need Help in Getting Started
msgSnippet: I am trying to write a test that: Starts a program Checks if the program has started properly(check the log book) Stops the program I am very new to Junit, as
messageBody:
I am trying to write a test that:

Starts a program
Checks if the program has started properly(check the
log book)
Stops the program

I am very new to Junit, as well as java programming. I
installed junit on my pc and was also able to run the
sample test, but when ever I try to write my own test
I get stuck. I understand that the main class has to
extend TestCase and the suit() has to be initiated in
main. Also, I understand what setup() and teardown()
does.

If I can know the basic structure of the program I am
trying to write, that will be absolutely great. I need
a jump start.

Thanks,
Wanni.
